Fitch's ratings on Xerox  including the  Long-Term Issuer Default Rating (IDR) of 'BBB-'  remain on Rating Watch Negative  pending clarification on the ultimate co

content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) NEW YORK  February 04 (Fitch) The cost of credit protection for Xerox  Corporation continues to rise as steadily widening credit default swap (CDS)  spreads will attest  according to Fitch Solutions in its latest CDS Case Study  Snapshot. Five-year CDS spreads on Xerox widened 31% over the past week and are 244% wider  compared to levels seen at this time one year ago.  Credit protection on Xerox's  debt is now pricing in 'BB' territory
name: Xerox Corporation
title: Fitch Solutions: Xerox CDS Reach Widest Level in Four Years

name: Xerox Corporation
title: UPDATE 2-Xerox cuts profit forecast again as revenue slide continues

content: Jan 30 Xerox Corp  best known as a maker of printers and copiers  reported a 3.5 percent fall in quarterly revenue as printer sales declined.
name: Xerox Corporation
title: Xerox revenue falls as printer sales decline

content: * As a core element of the agreement  Xerox has licensed Thinfilm's proprietary technology to manufacture Thinfilm Memory labels
name: Xerox Corporation
title: BRIEF-Thinfilm announces partnership with Xerox for mass production of Thinfilm Memory Labels
